message: I have a unique opportunity to sell this product to you at a competitive price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000.
Your offer is a bit high for me. I'm interested, but I can only do $8,500.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,500.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway. How about we settle at $9,000?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we might be going back and forth forever. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I'll meet you at $9,250.
